---
title: "Plastic Waste 2023 analisis"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
plastic <- read.csv("plastic.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```
```{r}
model <- lm(Total_Plastic_Waste_MT ~ Per_Capita_Waste_KG + Recycling_Rate + Main_Sources, data = plastic)
```
```{r}
summary(model)
```

```{r}
library(car)
```
```{r}
Anova(model,type = "III")
```

```{r}
shapiro.test(residuals(model))
```

```{r, fig.height=6, fig.width=7}
par(mfrow = c(2,2))
plot(model)
```
```{r}
model_interaction <- lm(Total_Plastic_Waste_MT ~ Per_Capita_Waste_KG *
                       Recycling_Rate * 
                       Main_Sources * 
                       Coastal_Waste_Risk, 
                       data = plastic)
summary(model_interaction)
```
```{r}
anova(model_interaction)
interact <- aov(Total_Plastic_Waste_MT ~ Per_Capita_Waste_KG *
                       Recycling_Rate * 
                       Main_Sources * 
                       Coastal_Waste_Risk, 
                       data = plastic)
```

```{r}
library(agricolae)
tukeysig <- TukeyHSD(interact,"Coastal_Waste_Risk")
plot(tukeysig)
```



```{r}
pointsmtkg <- ggplot(plastic, aes(x=Total_Plastic_Waste_MT, y=Per_Capita_Waste_KG,alpha = 0.5, fill = Country)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```


```{r, fig.height=16, fig.width=16}
ggplotly(pointsmtkg)
```
